review:
Dear Dr. Vishal

AMRI Hospital

Saltlake, Kolkata

I would like to thank everyone at AMRI hospital, Saltlake, Kolkata; especially Dr. Shambhu Vishal(General medicine) and Dr. Ritam Chakraborty(pulmonologist) and the entire nursing staff. 15th of February 2020 I got admitted in the hospital with high grade of fever and cough. I was very weak and the irritating cough made me more agitated. I was suffering from cold, cough and low grade fever from past 15-20 days and its became neglected due to my work pressure. On the day when I have landed on Dr. Vishal’s OPD, I never have heard his name before. Even I didn’t get time to research the well known doctors in AMRI hospital. Once I entered dr. vishal’s office with my wife, we saw a very young gentleman is welcoming us. By observing his age we were bit confused by thinking are we on safe hand, or does he has enough experience etc etc. Due to the lack of sleep and the irritating cough with high fever I was very restless. But his calm attitude, bedside attitude and knowledge gave me so much of confidence to go ahead with him. During my hospitalization he has visited me many times apart from his general rounds even at mid night. Also he has shared with me his personal mobile and whatsaApp number for an emergency. Moreover, during the hospitalization if any question arries in my mind after his general rounds I was asking him through whatsApp and surprisingly he was trying to explain one by one in very approachable manner. I feel a doctor apart from his clinical skill and knowledge; he should be friendly, approachable and should understand a patient’s psychology. Then being a patient half of the illness will be solved.

The hospital’s non-technical staffs were excellent and everything went like clockwork. This hospital is a class by itself and I would not now want to go anywhere else. Everything was so regularized and all my questions answered in a kind and friendly manner.

Thank you once again, it is wonderful to have hands that create miracles in other peoples live.

kind regards

Kinshuk Bhunia(AM30066101)

Kolkata, West Bengal

I had been to hospital and it was for health issue. He was amazing doctor. I was happy with his way of talking, not only with medication. I actually had anxiety issues. After talking to him, he was really good. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. Patient usually expects how doctor speaks and treats him because medicines anyone can give but he listened well about my issue. It was my first consultation with him. I was quite happy and no discrepancy. I went to him as I had done blood tests and couple of routine health checkup from my office. I wanted to get second opinion, as I had consulted before dermatologist for skin allergy. I have shown the prescription given by dermatologist to Dr. Shambhu. Late he prescribed another medicines. ** ****** ***** It gave instant relief. I am having anxiety issues still as its lock down period. There was no waiting time in the hospital, it was only 15 minutes I waited. Hospitality was fine. I had low deficiency in vitamin, so he suggested tablets.

He treated my Dad who was suffering with COVID-19. The case was little serious and somehow we consulted him online and strictly followed the diet and medicines as prescribed by Dr Sir. He is very kind, Poliet and very much patient friendly. 
Thanks sir for treating my dad so well and making him fit and healthy in 20days. I must recommend Dr vishal to the needy ones. 
Thanks a lot sir.

My daughter had health issue so went to hospital and I took her. Doctor was absolutely nice. She had fever so met the doctor. I am satisfied with the treatment given. Doctor was well behaved. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. No medicines was needed, as she was fine. There was some waiting time in the hospital. Hospitality was good.

We had met the doctor and it was for my wife as she had breathing issue. ****** *** ***** Medicine was prescribed by the doctor.  After few days, he told if any issues continue tablets. Medical tests was done in AMRI. We showed reports, it was ok. I am satisfied with the treatment given.  I can recommend doctor to my family or friends.  Waiting time was for 30- 45 minutes in hospital. My wife is good now.

I had consulted the doctor and it was for cold and fever. *** ****** *** ***** Medicine and mouth wash was prescribed by the doctor as I had tonsils issue. I am satisfied with the treatment given.  I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. There was no waiting time when I went. I am fine now. Hospitality was good.
Very nice doctor.. Listens the symptoms and treat very nicely. I have visited there for my fever treatment
Pleasant experience with Dr. Vishal. Gives a 360° view of the problem. He is friendly and patiently listens to his patients.

I had visited the hospital for my sister in law. Doctor was busy, ** *** *** **** ** ******** ********* I am not satisfied with doctor. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor.  *** ** **** ** ******** Blood test was done. She had UTI health issue and stomach ulcer. The patient is fine after she went to different doctor. Hospitality was good.

Thank you doctor for your your conduct and helping us during the when we needed help even at a time when no doctor was available.

Doctor Vishal I havent heard you before but we are grateful and may god give you success in life.

Very freindly and very appproachable,courteous and helping

Greatly recommended
